title: District with Most Citizens
description: Find which district has the most citizens and show the count.
story: Resource allocation time! Find out which district has the highest population so we can allocate more funding there. This could change the city's future!
hint: Use COUNT(*), GROUP BY, and ORDER BY with LIMIT to find the top district.
tableSetup: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS citizens (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), district VARCHAR(50), age INTEGER); INSERT INTO citizens (name, district, age) VALUES ('Alice', 'Downtown', 28), ('Bob', 'Uptown', 34), ('Carol', 'Downtown', 22), ('David', 'Midtown', 45), ('Eve', 'Downtown', 19), ('Frank', 'Uptown', 18), ('Grace', 'Midtown', 29), ('Henry', 'Downtown', 31), ('Iris', 'Uptown', 26), ('Amy', 'Midtown', 24), ('Andrew', 'Downtown', 35), ('Anna', 'Uptown', 27), ('Luke', 'Downtown', 30), ('Maria', 'Downtown', 25) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;
